MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 and LL29 postcode areas of Abergele and Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Dolwen, Llanlelian  and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line conductor and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05AM 18th February 2021
